title: Show the ping on loading screen to the others as like season 3.
body:
At season 3, we could see the other's ping on loading screen, but after season 4,  we can't see the other's ping.
The important thing is, we can understand the other's lagging and miss play when he has high ping.
However, we can't show objective evidence to the others after season 3. 
Why do you guys hide the ping????
PLEASE SHOW IT TO OTHERS.

replies.body: I agree, personally i don't like reporting someone feeding if they are lagging, since this happens in EUW quite often, i say YES
show it to your teammates, not enemies.
